name: Turbulent Time
description:
An experimental AI, which gives you challenges based on time fluctuating mechanics.
Each challenge gets harder, with implementation of security cannons and bots.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, where the theme was OUT OF CONTROL.

In our game, TIME is out of control, the game speeds up and slows down as per th 'AI's' wish,  leaving the player with no control

Made by:
Arnav Mehta
Pranav Kulkarni
Arindam Sharma
